mapper.select: SELECT id, title, priority, due_kind, due_date, due_time, is_completed, memo FROM todo_tasks ORDER BY id
SELECT id, title, priority, due_kind, due_date, due_time, is_completed, memo FROM todo_tasks WHERE (due_date >= #{start_date}) AND (due_date < #{end_date})
SELECT id, title, priority, due_kind, due_date, due_time, is_completed, memo FROM todo_tasks WHERE is_completed = False
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo_tasks (title, priority, due_kind, due_date, due_time, is_completed, memo) VALUES (#{title}, #{priority}, #{due_kind}, #{due_date}, #{due_time}, #{is_completed}, #{memo})
mapper.update: UPDATE todo_tasks SET title=#{title}, priority=#{priority}, due_kind=#{due_kind}, due_date=#{due_date}, due_time=#{due_time}, is_completed=#{is_completed}, memo=#{memo} WHERE id = #{id}
